p: We selected 11 curcumin derivatives (Table 1) to perform the neuraminidase inhibition screening assay. Most of them had an inhibitory effect on the structural protein NA of H1N1 virus, with IC 50 values ranging from 62.77 to 33,695.47 μM, while oseltamivir carboxylate (positive control) had an IC 50 value of 225.42 μM. Eleven active compounds were selected for 3D-QSAR and the docking study.
